title: Pannonian Avars
summary: The Pannonian Avars (/ˈævɑːrz/; also known as the Obri in chronicles of Rus, the Abaroi or Varchonitai[8] Greek: Βαρχονίτες, romanized: Varchonítes, or Pseudo-Avars[9] in Byzantine sources, the Apar, Old Turkic: 𐰯𐰺‎, to the Göktürks[10]) were an alliance of several groups of Eurasian nomads of unknown origins.[11][12][13][14][15][16]
